name: Vinícius Júnior
title: Wrong size shirt delivered
description: Received size M instead of L for the 'Classic Football Tee' (Order #9876). This is a priority as it's a gift. Need to arrange an exchange ASAP.

name: Jude Bellingham
title: Payment failed, money taken
description: The order total was deducted from my bank account, but the website shows 'Payment Failed.' Please verify the transaction and confirm Order #9877.

name: Rodrygo
title: Tracking number not working
description: The tracking link provided for Order #9878 leads to a 'Not Found' error page on the courier's website. I cannot check the shipping status.

name: Luka Modrić
title: Damaged item received, refund
description: The item (a glass coffee maker, Order #9879) arrived completely shattered. Attached photos of the damaged packaging and product. Requesting a full refund.

name: Toni Kroos
title: Discount code not applied
description: The promotional code 'SUMMER25' is not being accepted at checkout, even though the items in my cart meet the minimum spend requirement. Please help me apply it.

name: Éder Militão
title: Missing one item shipment
description: Order #9880 was supposed to contain 3 items (2 books and 1 lamp), but only the two books were included in the box. The 'Desk Lamp Pro' is missing.

name: David Alaba
title: Cannot log into account
description: I cannot log into my account. I tried resetting the password but the recovery email never arrived in my inbox (checked spam).

name: Thibaut Courtois
title: Cancel order placed accidentally
description: Please cancel Order #9881, placed about an hour ago. I accidentally duplicated an existing order. Items have not shipped yet.

name: Nacho Fernández
title: Product material specification question
description: Need clarification on the material used for the 'Outdoor Camping Tent.' Is the floor made of reinforced polyethylene or nylon?

name: Federico Valverde
title: Website slow performance
description: The product category pages are loading extremely slowly on my desktop browser (Chrome, Windows 11). It takes over 10 seconds to render the page.

name: Eduardo Camavinga
title: Request formal VAT invoice
description: I need a formal VAT invoice with my business details for Order #9882. The standard receipt email is insufficient for accounting purposes.

name: Aurélien Tchouaméni
title: Received expired food product
description: The gourmet tea package (Order #9883) I received has an expiration date that passed three weeks ago. This is unacceptable. Need a replacement immediately.

name: Kepa Arrizabalaga
title: Return portal malfunctioning
description: The online return portal stops responding when I try to select a reason for return. Cannot generate the return label for Order #9884.

name: Dani Carvajal
title: Modify delivery address request
description: Need to urgently change the shipping address for Order #9885. It has not shipped yet. The new address is [New Address Details].
